duties_responsibilities.duty: Respond to guest requests to ensure the safety and comfort of guests and provide exceptional guest interactions.
Perform general maintenance tasks, complete assigned work orders, and assist in the maintenance and repairs of all property areas.
Work as part of a team to assist other engineering personnel with routine repairs and preventive maintenance.
Monitor and maintain cleanliness, sanitation, and organization of assigned work areas.
Prepare for daily work assignments, review priorities and special projects, and ensure appropriate time management.
Maintain the safety and security of the property, guests, and fellow associates.

education_certification.credential: Basic knowledge of building maintenance fields and experience with diagnostic devices, mechanical, electrical, plumbing, HVAC, kitchen, and carpentry knowledge.
